eɪ.descriptionSecondary: front close to front mid vowel

aɪ.descriptionSecondary: front open to front close vowel

oʊ.descriptionSecondary: back close to back mid vowel

aʊ.descriptionSecondary: front open to back rounded vowel

ɔɪ.descriptionSecondary: back open to front mid vowel

p.descriptionSecondary: produced by obstructing airflow at the lips and releasing it
p.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过双唇阻断气流并释放产生

b.descriptionSecondary: produced by obstructing airflow at the lips and releasing it with vocal cord vibration
b.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过双唇阻断气流并伴随声带振动释放产生

t.descriptionSecondary: produced by obstructing airflow at the alveolar ridge and releasing it
t.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过齿龈阻断气流并释放产生

d.descriptionSecondary: produced by obstructing airflow at the alveolar ridge and releasing it with vocal cord vibration
d.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过齿龈阻断气流并伴随声带振动释放产生

k.descriptionSecondary: produced by obstructing airflow at the velum and releasing it
k.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过软腭阻断气流并释放产生

g.descriptionSecondary: produced by obstructing airflow at the velum and releasing it with vocal cord vibration
g.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过软腭阻断气流并伴随声带振动释放产生

ʔ.descriptionSecondary: produced by obstructing airflow at the glottis and releasing it
ʔ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过声门阻断气流并释放产生

m.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through the nose while the lips are closed
m.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过鼻腔气流并闭合双唇产生

n.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through the nose while the tongue touches the alveolar ridge
n.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过鼻腔气流并舌头触碰齿龈脊产生

ŋ.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through the nose while the back of the tongue touches the velum
ŋ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过鼻腔气流并舌头后部触碰软腭产生

f.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction between the lower lip and upper teeth
f.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过下唇和上牙之间的狭窄通道产生气流

v.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction between the lower lip and upper teeth with vocal cord vibration
v.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过下唇和上牙之间的狭窄通道伴随声带振动产生

s.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction at the alveolar ridge
s.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过齿龈狭窄通道产生气流

z.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction at the alveolar ridge with vocal cord vibration
z.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过齿龈狭窄通道伴随声带振动产生

ʃ.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction just behind the alveolar ridge
ʃ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过齿龈后方狭窄通道产生气流

ʒ.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction just behind the alveolar ridge with vocal cord vibration
ʒ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过齿龈后方狭窄通道伴随声带振动产生

h.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through the glottis without vocal cord vibration
h.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过声门气流且无声带振动产生

l.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow around the sides of the tongue while the tongue touches the alveolar ridge
l.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过舌头触碰齿龈脊并气流绕过舌头两侧产生

r.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow around the tongue while the tongue approaches the alveolar ridge without touching it
r.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过舌头接近齿龈脊但不触碰产生气流

w.descriptionSecondary: produced by rounding the lips and raising the back of the tongue toward the velum
w.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过圆唇并抬起舌头后部接近软腭产生

j.descriptionSecondary: produced by raising the middle of the tongue toward the hard palate without creating turbulence
j.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过抬起舌头中部接近硬腭且不产生气流湍流

tʃ.descriptionSecondary: produced by a stop closure at the postalveolar region followed by a fricative release
tʃ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过后齿龈区域的阻塞闭合并伴随擦音释放产生

dʒ.descriptionSecondary: produced by a stop closure at the postalveolar region followed by a fricative release with vocal cord vibration
dʒ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过后齿龈区域的阻塞闭合并伴随声带振动的擦音释放产生

θ.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction between the tongue and the upper teeth
θ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过舌头和上牙之间的狭窄通道产生气流

ð.descriptionSecondary: produced by airflow through a narrow constriction between the tongue and the upper teeth with vocal cord vibration
ð.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过舌头和上牙之间的狭窄通道伴随声带振动产生

ʍ.descriptionSecondary: produced by rounding the lips and raising the back of the tongue toward the velum without vocal cord vibration
ʍ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过圆唇并抬起舌头后部接近软腭且无声带振动产生

ɾ.descriptionSecondary: produced by a single rapid contact of the tongue against the alveolar ridge
ɾ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过舌头快速接触齿龈脊产生

ʔ.descriptionSecondary: produced by completely obstructing airflow at the glottis and releasing it
ʔ.descriptionSecondaryChinese: 通过完全阻断声门气流并释放产生
